demos.name: Bionet Time Encoding and Decoding Toolbox - Demos
demos.description: Programs that demonstrate how to use the Bionet Time Encoding and Decoding Toolbox.

demoitem.label: Time Encoding and Decoding with an Asynchronous Sigma-Delta Modulator
Time Encoding and Decoding with Multiple Asynchronous Sigma-Delta Modulators
Time Encoding and Decoding Using Filters with Arbitrary Delays
Time Encoding and Decoding of a Bandpass Signal with a Gammatone Filterbank and an Ensemble of Integrate-and-Fire Neurons
Time Encoding and Decoding with an Integrate-and-Fire neuron.
Time Encoding and Decoding with Multiple Integrate-and-Fire Neurons
Time Encoding and Decoding Using Spline Interpolation.
Time Encoding and Decoding of Multiple Signals with Multiple Integrate-and-Fire Neurons Using Spline Interpolation
Time Encoding and Decoding with ON-OFF Integrate-and-Fire Neurons Using Spline Interpolation.
